topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400f68d6368722ee9d60000#post_5400f68d6368722ee9d60000
[bq="Whatevs"]I finally figured out the answer to Godslayer mode.
!http://i.imgur.com/gLeDkcD.jpg![/bq]
"God is perceived as evil by the opposite door that you represent and perceived as good by the opposite door. Yes or No?"
If the bird to the heaven door is lying then he would have to say no.  If he is telling the truth then he would have to say yes.  If the bird to the hell door is lying then he would have to say yes.  If the bird to the hell door is telling the truth then he would have to say no.
